release.change: As part of initial release, the app should have the following features:
1. User should be able to view list of Subscription packages, grouped by categories.
2. User should be able to view details by selecting a package from list.
3. The package details includes an image, name and price of package and the duration.
4. The Field Marketers (Tellers) should be able to use the App to submit daily savings, and loan reports
5. The Tellers should be able to access all the customers ' details on their profile.
6. Cart also displays the total price for all the products added.
7. Customers who have saved some money, should be able to borrow some money, if need be.
8. User should be able to navigate to packages details from their profile well.
9. User should be able to make payment on the app, and also see their transactions.
10. Cart should be persisted in the app i.e. if user exits the app, the cart should be available on re-launch of the app.
11. All the data needs to be stored locally within the app and should not rely on any external services for the same.
